NON-COMMERCIAL USE LICENSE AGREEMENT FOR PROBT

By installing, copying or otherwise using ProBT, you agree to be bound
by the terms of the Non-Commercial Use License Agreement. If you do
not agree with the terms of this agreement, you may not use or copy
the software product.

1. NON-COMMERCIAL USE:

 This agreement intends to make it easy for developers and end users
to use ProBT for Non-Commercial Purposes, where "Non-Commercial
Purposes" means:

To evaluate ProBT and to do exploratory or educational development
and "proof of concept" prototyping of software applications, whether
at home for personal use or at work as a prototyping tool, and where
"Non-Commercial Purposes" specifically excludes development of a
system to be used for commercial gain, whether to be sold or to be
used within a company, partnership, organization or entity that
transacts commercial business.

2. GRANT OF LICENSE: 

This agreement grants you the following non-exclusive rights:

You may use the ProBT on any number of computers, either standalone,
or on a network, so long as every use of the ProBT is for
NON-COMMERCIAL USE.

Unless expressly permitted under this agreement, you will not:
• alter, remove, hide or cover proprietary notices in or on ProBT.
• decompile, disassemble or otherwise attempt or assist others to
  reverse engineer ProBT.
• use ProBT in any application that is intended to create or could, in
  the event of malfunction or failure, cause serious personal injury
  or property damage.
• make use of ProBT for commercial gain, whether directly, indirectly
  or incidentally.

3. LIABILITY:

This software is provided "as is" and any express or implied
warranties, including, but not limited to, the implied warranties of
merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose are
disclaimed. In no event shall Probayes be liable for any direct,
indirect, incidental, special, exemplary, or consequential damages
(including, but not limited to, procurement of substitute goods or
services; loss of use, data, or profits; or business interruption)
however caused and on any theory of liability, whether in contract,
strict liability, or tort (including negligence or otherwise) arising
in any way out of the use of this software, even if advised of the
possibility of such damage.


COMMERCIAL USE LICENSE AGREEMENT FOR PROBT

For commercial use, please contact Probayes to buy a license
(www.probayes.com).
